title: La Vuelta a España 2021 Standings after Stage 12
content:
General Classification / Red Jersey 

The General Classification mainly stayed the same after Stage 12 of the Vuelta a España, with all of the main contenders for the red jersey finishing in the front peloton, led across the line by stage winner Magnus Cort.

1. Odd Christian Eiking
2. Guillaume Martin +0:58
3. Primož Roglič +1:56
4. Enric Mas +2:31
5. Miguel Angel Lopez +3:38
6. Jack Haig +3:55
7. Egan Bernal +4:46
8. Adam Yates +4:57
9. Sepp Kuss +5:03
10. Felix Großschartner +5:38

La Vuelta a Espana 2021: Route, Predictions and Contenders

Points Classification

1. Fabio Jakobsen - 180 points
2. Magnus Cort - 114 points
3. Primož Roglič - 106 points
4. Michael Matthews - 92 points
5. Arnaud Demare - 74 points

La Vuelta Stage 12 Preview

King of the Mountains Classification

1. Damiano Caruso - 31 points
2. Romain Bardet - 27 points
3. Michael Storer - 17 points
4. Pavel Sivakov - 16 points
5. Jack Haig - 15 points

Young Rider's Classification

1. Egan Bernal
2. Aleksandr Vlasov + 1:22
3. Gino Mäder +2:08
4. Juan Pedro Lopez +4:49
5. Rémy Rochas +17:12

Team Classification

1. Ineos Grenadiers
2. UAE Team Emirates +11:31
3. Movistar Team +15:47
4. Bahrain Victorious +16:00
5. Team Jumbo Visma +21:59

Cover image: Justin Setterfield/Getty Images
author: Peter Stuart
